EmailTemplate.name: 20181_BKTechSupport_LG.20181_KSNTechSupport_Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Easy Access to KSN Technical Support Resources
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]>
Dear Customers, We want to make it as easy as possible for you to prepare your media, download and load your KSN databases. Whether you're loading a new database or upgrading to the latest version, these videos and other resources explain the process to simplify your experience.
To access these resources, please visit the Wingman Services KSN Customer Center <[[https://wingmanservices.bendixking.com/wingman/ksn.do]]>. The latest database and software update information is also posted on the Wingman Services portal <[[https://wingmanservices.bendixking.com/wingman/pages/wingmanSoftwareUpdates.jsp]]>.
In addition, access the Honeywell MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/JI2qQ00TnX0Ziq00G000000]]> portal for these supporting documents:
- System Installation Manual: 006-10716-0000 <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/lqI0j000qn000X2G00Z0U0Q]]>, ATA: 34-70-06 - Set-up Manual: D201306000100 <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/Q0qX00I0QV2q00ZnG00k000]]>
If you still need further guidance, this KSN 770 e-learning course <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/qnXQ0G00ql0Z0q02I00W000]]> is very helpful.
For all BendixKing technical product support, please visit our technical support site at http://www.bendixking.com/Support <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/Bn00mQ2XZ00000qI00Xq00G]]>, e-mail us at techsupport@bendixking.com <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/dG0q0nYZq00X000I0n020Q0]]> or call us at 1.855.250.7027 (US & Canada) or 1.505.903.6148 (outside US & Canada).
